DOC.brief_summary: The Effect Ethnic Moxifloxacin Induced QT Interval Prolongation Korean Japanese Healthy Subjects
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Ethnic Moxifloxacin Induced QT Interval Prolongation Korean Japanese Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study explore ethnic gender difference Moxifloxacin induce QT interval prolongation Japanese Korean subject .
DOC.criteria: 1 ) Subjects Japan Korea deem healthy determine clinically significant deviation normal medical history , physical examination , ECGs , clinical laboratory determination . 2 ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.6 26.4 kg/m2 , BMI = weight ( kg ) / [ height ( ) ] 2 . 1 ) Evidence organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normal physical examination , vital sign , ECG clinical laboratory determination beyond consistent target population . 2 ) Any follow 12lead ECG prior study drug administration , confirm repeat . Heart rate ≤ 45 bpmmsec Heart rate ≥ 100 bpmmsec PR ≥ 210 msec QRS ≥ 120 msec QT ≥ 500 msec QTcF : male ≥ 450 msec , female ≥470msec Iincomplete right bundle branch block Marked Sinus Arrhythmia Wondering pacemaker Atrial rhythm
